content.name: Flamebrand Sword
content.title: Flamebrand Sword

effects.name: Flaming Blade
effects.desc: When you hit with this weapon, it deals an additional 1d6 fire damage.

effects.name: Ignite
effects.desc: Once per day, you can cast *Burning Hands* (DC 13) from the sword.

content.description: A blade forged in elemental fire, warm to the touch and etched with glowing runes. Legends say it was wielded by a hero of the Flame Pact.
